short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IDmelon WebLogin empowers you to replace your passwords with a single tap of your card on a reader.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your information safe, and enjoy the intuitive hassle-free user experience, since IDmelon is where security and convenience meet. Note that you need to first have the latest version of IDmelon Card Reader Driver (v3.0.0+) installed on your PC. For more information, see our Privacy Policy.
https://idmelon.com/privacy-policy
